com.jaunt
Class CookieJar

java.lang.Object
  com.jaunt.CookieJar

public class CookieJar
extends java.lang.Object

A container for Cookie objects.

Since:
0.9.0
Author:
Tom Cervenka

Method Summary
 void addCookie(Cookie cookie)
          Adds the specified Cookie and removes any existing cookies with the same name and path.
 void empty()
          Empties all Cookies from the CookieJar.
 java.util.List<Cookie> get(java.lang.String domain)
          Returns the List of cookies associated with the specified (case insentitive) domain.
 java.util.List<Cookie> getCookies()
          Returns a List of all cookies.
 void loadCookies()
          clears any existing cookies and load new cookies from cookies.obj, located in outputPath as defined in UserAgentSettings.
 void loadCookies(java.io.File cookiesFile)
          clears any existing cookies and loads cookies from the specified cookies file.
 java.util.List<Cookie> remove(java.lang.String domain)
          Removes cookies for the specified (case insensitive) domain.
 boolean removeCookie(Cookie cookie)
          Removes the specified cookie from the CookieJar.
 void saveCookies()
          Saves cookies to cookies.obj, located in output directory as defined in Settings.
 void saveCookies(java.io.File outputFile)
          Saves cookies to the specified file.
 java.lang.String toString()
          Returns a string representation of the CookieJar.
